tool_description: This API can provide ranking difficulty level of the keywords in Google, Yahoo, or Bing search engines.
name: Keyword Difficulty
title: Keyword Difficulty

api_list.name: keyword & search engine
api_list.description: It can accept any keyword and search_engine values google, yahoo, or bing. The difficulty_level it returns are Very Difficult, Difficult, Normal, Easy, or Very Easy.
